h2_title: The New West Celestial Jade Lotus Pill
content:
The New West Celestial Jade Lotus Pill



The New West Celestial Jade Lotus Pill is hiding on Turtle Island. From the Turtle Island Keeper's Shrine, turn left and run off the edge of the first cliff. The Celestial Jade Lotus Pill is sitting in a golden chest by the rock wall.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Celestial_Jade_Lotus_Pill_Locations.md", within the section "Celestial Jade Lotus Pill Locations" and the sub-section "The New West Celestial Jade Lotus Pill". The content is presented below:

The New West Celestial Jade Lotus Pill



The New West Celestial Jade Lotus Pill is hiding on Turtle Island. From the Turtle Island Keeper's Shrine, turn left and run off the edge of the first cliff. The Celestial Jade Lotus Pill is sitting in a golden chest by the rock wall.
